name: Panic in the Dungeon
description:
Panic in the Dungeon is a bullet-hell dungeon crawler roguelike! Delve deeper into the dungeon while playing as one of three classes with wildly different playstyles. But be warned! You can only stay on each floor for 10 seconds before losing health - don't let your greed get the better of you!

Ranger: Pure offense. Rain arrowy vengeance down on the heads of your foes from anywhere in the room!

Mage: Higher attack speed and the ability to summon ice barriers to freeze your foes or protect yourself!

Rogue: With a higher chance to find loot and the ability to slink away from any fight, you'll be in it for the big haul!

There is a boss hidden deep within the dungeon. Can you reach it and wrestle away its glittering hoard?

===================================

CONTROLS

[W][A][S][D] keys to move

[E] to open and close menu

[Space] for menu select

Left Mouse Click to fire basic projectile

Right Mouse Click to use Class Ability

===================================

This game was made for the Bullet Hell Jam 2021. The game jam's required genre was Bullet Hell, and the optional theme was "10 Seconds". I chose to incorporate the two by making a top-down dungeon crawler with Binding of Isaac-esque room generation and constant pressure from the ticking clock.

This was a solo effort and I used each of the following:

All code and graphics - GameMaker Studio 2

Music - Beepbox

Sound Effects - Halftone Sound Effects Pack
